column2: Bless the target with the powers of the Changer of Way, flesh may reform under his touch to better serve the blessed...maybe.
When the winds of magic blow strong on a battlefield, Tzeentch may use his influence to protect his worthy followers. As long as they remain useful.
All magic, all spells originate from Tzeentch. Those who dabble in magic are mere intruders in the great Schemer's domain and risk to draw his ire - or maybe worse, his attention.
A barrage of flames imbued with the power of the Changer, they burn and mutate whatever they touch at the same time.
A whirlwind of changing and mutating flames, those who emerge from it have to bear more than just burn wounds.
